menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: Menu 'Fitness' is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports; active and healthy lifestyle. This is a brand new product with best price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Vegan Menu'
menu.descr: Our special 'Vegan Menu' is all about the careful selection of ingredients: no animal products. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element! OM Everybody!

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: Menu 'Premium' offers you beautiful packaging design and high-quality restaurant level dish, as well. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
